ai_summary.Response: This commit updates the documentation for app passwords in Microsoft Entra multifactor authentication. It clarifies that if app passwords are enabled, users will be required to create one during the MFA registration process. Additionally, it advises disabling legacy authentication via a Conditional Access policy when app passwords are disabled to prevent their continued use.
